title: Market Structure Shift / CHOCH
prompt: Create a trading chart showing Market Structure Shift (MSS) and Change of Character (CHOCH). Display 20+ candlesticks showing a downtrend transitioning to uptrend. Label the bearish structure: 'LH' (Lower High), 'LL' (Lower Low) markers. Show the break: A candle closing above the last LH with 'MSS/CHOCH' label and horizontal break line. Mark the shift point with a star icon. Show new bullish structure forming: 'HL' (Higher Low), 'HH' (Higher High). Add entry arrow at the MSS point. Include before/after zones: 'Bearish Regime' (red tint) transitioning to 'Bullish Regime' (green tint). Dark background (#0F172A). Clear market structure analysis style.
negative_prompt: confusing structure labels, overlapping zones, unclear break point, cluttered
